description:
Introducing SAPIEN Technology in Madden NFL 24 on Xbox Series X|S
SAPIEN Technology delivers a leap forward in NFL player realism with more body definition and variation to athlete physiques resulting in realistic player movement.

FieldSENSE™ on Xbox Series X|S:  INCREASED CONTROL AND REALISM
The newest iteration of FieldSENSE™ provides an enhanced gameplay foundation on Xbox Series X|S giving you greater control and delivering realism to all the ways you play.

Gameplay
AI Enhancements (Xbox Series X|S only)
Smarter AI enables smoother and more realistic player action and reaction to the plays you call

Skill-Based Passing 2.0 (Xbox Series X|S only)
Dive for a winning one-hander with improved catching AI, thread the needle with surgical accuracy using new throw animations, and anticipate more authentic defensive reactions with enhanced DB behavior.

Hit Everything 2.0 (Xbox Series X|S only)
The ratings and situational awareness of your teammates is now more impactful, giving you confidence they can push the pile during stand up tackles for extra yardage and attack the football more effectively.

Game Modes
Superstar: The League (Xbox Series X|S only)
Customize your Superstar to complete objectives such as the NFL Combine to help determine your Draft order and build your legacy as you navigate all-new mini games and live player grading across a variety of positions and customizable avatars throughout the year.

Superstar Showdown (Xbox Series X|S only)
Show off and show out in this all-new atmosphere.

Updates to Franchise on Xbox Series X|S
Play new mini games and training camp drills to progress your team. Utilize a more streamlined team relocation feature with new cities and new uniforms to create your own Franchise story.

Madden Ultimate Team
Always have something to play for with Field Pass objectives that unlock rewards in Madden Ultimate Team™ and help you build the strongest team possible.

Cross-play (Xbox Series X|S only)
Connect with players on other platforms in Online Head to Head and more.*

Madden NFL 24 Xbox One Game Modes
Lead your team to a Super Bowl victory in Franchise, build a powerhouse Madden Ultimate Team™, take over The Yard, be the star in Face of the Franchise, and unleash your X-Factors in SSKO. Face of the Franchise and The Yard not available on Xbox Series X|S version.

*Conditions apply. See https://www.ea.com/games/madden-nfl/madden-nfl-24/cross-play for details.

This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items.

Conditions & restrictions apply. See www.ea.com/legal for details.
shortDescription:
Experience the newest iteration of FieldSENSE™ in Madden NFL 24 on Xbox Series X|S
More realistic character movement and smarter AI gives you control to play out your gameplay strategy with the confidence to dominate any opponent in Madden NFL 24.
title: Madden NFL 24 Xbox Series X|S
